message.body: We sent Mia an ecard so check your email with her. Also if you get a box with no message it is from us. I put a gift message but seems like it doesn't always work.
Thank you for my card and present! Okay ill look out for it. 'Mia is having a party at this pottery place...decorate something then they "fire" it all a
ll that...it's a small group so should be easy and fun for them
That should be fun. I think the new Dan Brown book just came out if you are looking for something to read
Oh ya, dad is reading it...he just got here last night. I told him to tell me if he likes it, first!
